description: The status of a a submitted FormData object.

formDataId.description: The system issued identifier of the FormData object.

submittedOn.description: The date when the object was submitted.

reviewedOn.description: The date when this submission was reviewed.

reviewedBy.description: The id of the service user that reviewed the submission.

status.description: The current status of the FormData object.

rejectionMessage.description: The message provided by the reviewer when a submission is rejected.
